title: Regulation (EEC) No 2602/69 of the Council of 18 December 1969 on retaining the Management Committee procedure
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2602/69 OF THE COUNCIL  of 18 December 1969  on retaining the Management Committee procedure
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions governing the procedure to be followed by the Mangement Committees established in the various sectors of the common organisation of agricultural markets shall be retained beyond expiry of the transitional period provided for in Article 8 of the Treaty.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1970.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1969.
For the Council
The President
P. LARDINOIS  (1)OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 24. (2)OJ No L 153, 1.7.1968, p. 8.
